spec_data.Name: perl-NNTPClient
spec_data.Description:
This module implements a client interface to NNTP, enabling a Perl 5
application to talk to NNTP servers. It uses the Object Oriented
Programming interface.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:12:21 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl 5 module to talk to NNTP (RFC977) server
